title: Innovation & Leadership
subtitle: Creating impact through technology and community building

experiences.title: Co-Founder & Technical Lead
experiences.description: Co-founded Unitech, a technology initiative at university focused on bridging the gap between academic learning and real-world applications. Led technical development and mentored over 50 students in modern web technologies.

experiences.title: AI Research Contributor
experiences.description: Active contributor to AI Mila, the university's artificial intelligence research initiative. Worked on machine learning projects, contributed to research papers, and developed AI-powered solutions for academic and practical applications.

experiences.title: Open Source Contributor
experiences.description: Contributing to open source projects including React, Vue ecosystem, and developer tools used by thousands of developers worldwide. Focus on improving developer experience and accessibility.

experiences.title: Tech Community Builder
experiences.description: Organizing and leading web development workshops, hackathons, and tech meetups. Building bridges between academia and industry while fostering innovation in the local tech ecosystem.
